title: Reimbursement for business expenses
body:
Description of the proposed Governance Action;
90,000 SWM payable to those for reimbursement for normal operating activities and development.

Identify the specific uses for which Swarm Treasury funds may be expended to support the Governance Action;
44,000 SWM payable to @corn for site work 
6,000 SWM payable to @daniel for site work 
15,000 SWM payable to @john for site work 
25,000 SWM payable to @daniel for Satoshi Club AMA
